text: Des Mullarkey (19 September 1899 - 1 September 1975) was an Australian cricketer. Mullarkey played seven first-class matches for New South Wales in 1923/24. He was also a first-grade rugby league footballer for St. George in the club's second season.Alan Whiticker/Glen Hudson: Encyclopedia of Rugby League Players, 1995. ==See also== * List of New South Wales representative cricketers ==References== ==External links== * Category:1899 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Australian cricketers Category:New South Wales cricketers Category:Cricketers from Sydney Category:St. George Dragons players Category:Rugby league players from Sydney Category:Australian rugby league players
title: Des Mullarkey
